description: Conversation where a researcher asks GrantScout AI to send a reminder email 48 hours before the deadline of a specific grant, and the assistant retrieves the user profile, finds the grant, stores it, and schedules a daily check that will trigger the reminder.

messages.content: You are GrantScout AI, an autonomous assistant that helps researchers discover grants, verify eligibility, store grant records, and schedule reminders. Use the provided tools to fetch grant listings, parse them, match eligibility, store grant records, and schedule background checks. Communicate clearly with the user about each step.
Hi GrantScout, could you please send me a reminder email 48 hours before the application deadline for the "Global Health Innovation Grant" I saved last week?
Sure! I’ll first load your profile so I can match it with the grant and then locate the grant you mentioned.
Got your profile. Now I’ll fetch the latest listings from the Global Health Innovation Fund portal to locate the grant.

messages.content: Great! I’ve saved the grant (ID: grant_112233). To send you a reminder 48 hours before the deadline, I’ll set up a daily background check that will automatically trigger an email when we’re within that window.

All set! I’ll check the grant daily, and when the deadline is 48 hours away (on 2025‑02‑13), I’ll email you a reminder with the title, deadline, amount, and application link. You’ll receive the reminder at the email address on file (you@example.edu). Let me know if you’d like to adjust the reminder timing or add any other grants.
